pages.text: A $(item)Torment Scroll$() contains the instructions to perform the Ritual used to summon a demonic creature named $(l:creatures/lord_of_torment)Lord of Torment$(/l). These scrolls are rare, but $(l:creatures/imp)Flame Imps$(/l) have been known to possess and gift them, sometimes.

Using the scroll is enough to start the ritual, and in case of incorrect steps, the scroll will whisper to the player.$(p)For a start, try to stand in the dead center of a $(l:dimensions/stone_circle)Stone Circle$(/l).
